首款基于新32位 RuyiSDK 的AIoT量产芯片.message: Der erste AIoT-Massenproduktionschip basierend auf dem neuen 32-Bit-RuyiSDK.

在线软件源和管理工具集中存储了 RISC-V 集成开发环境所需的编译工具链、调试.message: The online software source and management tool centrally stores the compilation tool chain, debugging tools, simulators, runtime environment, documents, codes, tools, target system images, and other contents required for the RISC-V integrated development environment, as well as tools for interacting with the online software source.

将 Ruyi 包管理器带到桌面环境.message: Make Ruyi available on the desktop

针对 XuanTie 生态芯片优化的 Debian 发行版.message: Debian distribution optimized for the XuanTie ecosystem

荔枝派 4A 软件生态已并入 RuyiSDK 项目.message: The LicheePi 4A software ecosystem is now integrated into the RuyiSDK project

矽速科技（Sipeed）与PLCT实验室联合宣布，RuyiSDK 将作为 Lic.message: Sipeed and the PLCT Lab jointly announced that RuyiSDK will serve as the upstream support platform for the LicheePi 4A development board, taking responsibility for future system maintenance, upgrades, and software support. This not only promotes the development and broader adoption of RISC-V development boards but also provides developers with a more convenient and efficient development environment.

RISC-V 开发板与操作系统支持矩阵.message: RISC-V Board and OS Support Matrix

一个专门用来开发能够运行在 RISC-V 架构设备上的软件和应用的工具箱。可以帮.message: A toolbox specifically designed for developing software and applications that can run on RISC-V architecture devices. It can help developers write and test their own programs without the need for users to spend time setting up the environment.

RuyiSDK 开发者社区现已开启.message: The RuyiSDK Community has a new discussion forum—join the conversation!

社区提供文档和教程、论坛和技术讨论区等功能，目的是为 RISC-V 开发者提供一.message: The community provides functions such as documentation and tutorials, forums and technical discussion areas, with the aim of providing an open communication platform for RISC-V developers, providing mutual technical support and resource sharing, gathering RISC-V developers and promoting the development of the RISC-V ecosystem.

我们的代码完全开源，意味着每个人都可以在许可证允许的条件下查看、使用、修改和共享.message: Our code is completely open source, which means everyone can view, use, modify and share it under the conditions permitted by the license. Whether you are a developer, student, enthusiast or enterprise, you can freely participate in our project and build a better RuyiSDK together. Welcome to join our community and promote the development of open source together!

第三期 Meetup 重磅回顾：技术大咖齐聚，精彩不容错过！.message: Review of the third Meetup: Technology experts gathered together, the excitement is not to be missed!

面向 RISC-V 架构的一体化集成开发环境.message: All-in-one integrated development environment for RISC-V architecture

开源之夏合肥工业大学站，廖仕华分享成为一名GCC开发者的成长路径.message: Open Source Promotion Plan 2025: Hefei University of Technology—Shihua Liao Shared His Journey to Becoming a GCC Developer

在分享中，廖仕华深入剖析了成为一名 GCC 开发者所需的关键技能和知识体系。他不.message: In this talk, Shihua Liao analyzed the key skills and knowledge system required to become a GCC developer. He explained the core concepts and compilation process of GCC, and shared practical programming and debugging insights from his own experience.

2025软件所公众科学日，PLCT实验室揭秘RISC-V\"小架构，大神通\"，.message: 2025 Public Science Day at the Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences: PLCT Lab Unveils the Power of RISC-V—Small Architecture, Big Potential!

与PLCT实验室一起，共同探寻软件科学的更多奥秘与可能！.message: Join the PLCT Lab to explore the mysteries and possibilities of software science!

李永泰工程师赴东京出席2025 AsiaLLVM开发者大会，探讨LLVM与GCC.message: Engineer Yongtai Li Has Attended the 2025 AsiaLLVM Developer Conference in Tokyo to Discuss LLVM vs. GCC Performance on RISC-V

李永泰指出，LLVM/Flang 工具链已具备完整的 RISC-V SPEC C.message: Yongtai Li noted that the LLVM/Flang toolchain now fully supports RISC-V SPEC CPU builds. However, continued effort is needed for Fortran optimization and certain passes. Going forward, focus will be placed on tracking LLVM version updates, monitoring regressions, and following SPEC CPU-related tuning.

RuyiSDK首次线下Meetup回顾.message: Review of RuyiSDK's first offline meetup

每两周获得最新开发进展.message: Get the latest development progress every two weeks

随时看到来自 RuyiSDK 团队的重大消息.message: See important news from the RuyiSDK team at any time

RuyiSDK · 为 100 万 RISC-V 软件开发人员做好准备.message: RuyiSDK: Preparing for 1 Million RISC-V Software Developers

您可以扫描二维码，或者点击二维码唤起 QQ 加入群聊.message: You can scan the QR code or click on the QR code to launch QQ and join the group chat
